Description: Worked as a SharePoint Developer,Developed a SharePoint 2013 portal for the department of Public Safety at State of Minnesota to store all docs.
Worked as a SharePoint Developer,Designed and developed custom templates and provided technical support to the SharePoint publishing site and Team site.
Involved in the creation of detailed SharePoint architecture, metadata and topology.Responsible in meeting the Stakeholders to gather the requirements.

Worked as SharePoint/Power platform Admin.Configured Power Apps Portal environment from Scratch.Worked on the Architecture and implementation of Azure Storage, Azure, Azure Blob Storage and Azure Functions.
Worked as a PowerApps Admin/Developer Blue flex Renewal Project was an initiation to automate the entire renewal process which was previously a manual process handled by the Underwriting team.
